pageContext.title: Welcome to WPCouchCon!
pageContext.excerpt: A bit about WPCouchCon from their own site. What is WPCouchCon? First Desi virtual WordPress Conference is a highly curated assemble of WordPress people. WPCouchCon will feature the best of the handpicked speakers who will share their experiences and knowledge with a selected group of attendees.
pageContext.content:
A bit about WPCouchCon from their own site.

What is WPCouchCon?

First Desi virtual WordPress Conference is a highly curated assemble of WordPress people. WPCouchCon will feature the best of the handpicked speakers who will share their experiences and knowledge with a selected group of attendees.
